tech_dystopian.suffix: Surveillance state, neon corporate logos, polluted skies, abandoned technology, robot overlords, urban decay, Blade Runner meets Black Mirror

cyber_wasteland.suffix: Digital ruins, glitched reality, broken holograms, abandoned servers, cyber graveyard, matrix errors, post-digital collapse

ai_uprising.suffix: Robot armies, human resistance, mechanical overlords, factory cities, red warning lights, Terminator aesthetic, machine dominance

corporate_hellscape.suffix: Mega-corporations, endless cubicles, holographic ads, worker drones, glass towers, dystopian offices, cyberpunk capitalism

digital_prison.suffix: Facial recognition cameras, social credit scores, digital tracking, privacy death, Big Brother watching, 1984 meets modern tech

data_harvesting.suffix: Human data farms, neural extraction, mind reading machines, thought police, consciousness mining, digital soul extraction
